Issue.description: }} {{git rebase master }} git commit --amend *_make a tweak to commit message_* git review Check for clean CI passes merge ---------------------- Changes ---------------------------- Update bootstrap.sh for latest baseimage: export THIRDPARTY_IMAGE_VERSION=0.4.8 Update Makefile {{BASE_VERSION = 1.2.0}} {{PREV_VERSION = 1.2.0-rc1}} EXPERIMENTAL ?= false Update docs/source/samples.rst for 1.2.0-rc1 e.g. curl -sSL https://goo.gl/6wtTN5 | bash -s 1.2.0-rc1 {{release_notes/v1.2.0-rc1.txt should be created}} {{docs/source/releases.rst should be updated with prose and link to GH release page}} {{change log should be generated just *after* *rebasing* to pick up the last minute merged CRs and linked from docs/source/releases.rst}} ./scripts/changelog.sh v1.1.0 v1.2.0-rc1 >
